people.name: Caleb Ng
people.title: President
people.bio: Caleb is a male human being of 21 years of age. Like most adolescent boys, he enjoys a various number of physical activities such as wrestling, biking, and skating. Caleb also partakes in a unique sport involving many others chasing a rotating flying disc around a field while chanting “go RIT spudheds!”

people.name: Mary Tannian
people.title: Vice President
people.bio: Mary is a confirmed plant enthusiast, just don’t ask how many she’s killed. When she’s not sneaking home another houseplant, she’s most likely rewatching adventure time and inhaling fettuccine. Her other hobbies include recruiting her roommate to dye her hair at the kitchen table and eating corn straight out of the can.

people.name: Liza Comley
people.title: Treasurer
people.bio: I love hoarding plants, making oddly specific playlists and traveling (I’ve fallen down in 8 different countries ~teehe~). I also have dreams of becoming a bee keeper but im terrified of bees :^)

people.name: Will McCloskey
people.title: Webmaster
people.bio: Will, like many others, is a human. There is no evidence to suggest otherwise. He can use a computer, and seems to enjoy a hearty game of Dungeons & Dragons.

people.name: Jane Brennan
people.title: Content Creator
people.bio: Jane sticks to the 3 main food groups: pickles, Sourpatch Kids, and bananas. She’s addicted to learning musical instruments and will most likely own a dachshund one day. Jane loves being outside and will definitely challenge you to a game of Bananagrams. Split.
